document_data.History: Atrocious inhabited the dungeon lab of Luvia's within the [[Bloodmire Manor]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Upper City|Upper City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]]. The guard dog of sorts was the sentry that stood by the passage to the mansion's deepest clears. When confronted with intruders, two-head Atrocious, alongside several smaller flesh hounds, would attack relentlessly with their [[poison]]ous gas vomit attacks, and Atrocious would launch chunks of its own body at the enemies. Presumably, the chimeric abomination was slain by the five heroes who stood against [[Mordoc SeLanmere]].
